description:
The kids end up in a parallel dystopian world where chaos reigns. Will they be able to find their way back to their own world?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyuuseishu wa Dare Da!? / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
Who Is the Savior!? / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
救世主は誰だ!? / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル
